name: Bubble Shooter: Puzzle Pop 3
description:
Start a magical journey with cute dinosaur pets, and rescue the Nya cat together!
This Bubble Shooter Puzzle Pop game is especially for you! It helps to engage your brain and relax the body.
It's a simple classic ball-blasting game that is fun for all ages. The colorful, bright tiny bubbles improve the children's ability to perceive the world. The adults' mental strategies also exercise when considering passing through levels with few bubbles.
Boost your brain and have fun in this free offline shooting game. With new features, you'll be a warrior for justice to rescue the baby pet dragons and help Nya reunite with his family.
Play the brain matching game, complete over 2000 puzzle levels, and speed your mind up.

How to play the fun bubble burst game?
- Aim balloons strategically and release the bubble to shoot.
- Blast balls by matching three or above bubbles.
- Use fewer shots to score higher and try to win 3 stars.

Discover and use powerful bonus boosters.
- Drop balls to charge the witch's magical orb creating a bomb bubble.
- Beam Cannon destroys a bubble line in the chosen direction.
- Thunderball crushes a row of everything.
- Blackstorm can absorb any ball of one color.
- Starburst converts unwanted bubbles into magical power.
- More amazing Power-ups for you to explore.

Addictive bubble explodes game features.
- Fun levels galore.
- Free offline brain tester game.
- Continuous level update.
- Beautiful visual effects.
- Cute pet baby and Nya cat.

Let's embark on a thrilling brain journey together. You will be addicted as it will challenge and entertain you.
